TextBody:
Hello Yi,

Thank you for reaching out!

Netwrix has received reports that following the deployment of CoSoSys Endpoint Protector Hotfix #1 the system may cease to process certain events.
Netwrix has confirmed this behavior and is working on a revision to Hotfix #1 to resolve this issue.
As a precaution, Netwrix has temporarily paused distribution of the hotfix until a replacement is available.
Customers who have deployed Hotfix #1 and are experiencing an issue with processing events should contact the Netwrix support team.

The client version will be provided as soon as the patch will be live again.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #413895 - [#2204-LKH] HotFix not available

TextBody:
Hello Yi,

Thank you for getting back to us.

The hotfix should now be available under the Live Update menu.

Please take a snapshot from your virtualization environment before you apply the fix.

Once the hot fix is applied, please check if everything is in place and let us know the outcome.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
